official_title: A bill to provide that the authority to establish and administer flexible and compressed work schedules for Federal Government employees be extended through October 31, 1985.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Employees Flexible and Compressed Work Schedules Act of 1982 to extend its provisions through October 31, 1985.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the authority to establish and administer flexible and compressed work schedules for Federal Government employees be extended through October 31, 1985.
